about.title: About
about.p1: I'm a software engineer based in Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic. Most of my experience has been on the web as a Fullstack Developer, with a bit of mobile and desktop.
about.p2: I'm a tech nerd and tinkering with new things is my jam. I love to build simple and clean solutions to complex problems.

tech.title: Tech
tech.content: Some of my favorite tech to build with:

tech.better-auth: If I'm not rolling my own, I'm probably using this
tech.bun: Both as a package manager and a runtime
tech.docker: My go-to for local development and deploying certain apps
tech.drizzle: Almost as good as raw SQL
tech.nextjs: My framework of choice when building web applications
tech.react-router: Simple and clean routing, love it for routing inside browser extensions
tech.redis: For caching... and maybe everything else
tech.sqlite: Just spin up a local.db and you're good to go
tech.tailwindcss: Never going back to plain CSS
tech.tanstack-router: When you need a bit more type-safety than what React Router provides
tech.typescript: Never going back to plain JavaScript
tech.unistyles: One of the best styling libraries for React Native
